directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.  Saute onion and garlic until golden brown.  Stir in red pepper flakes, tomato sauce, hot water, parsley, salt, pepper and paprika.  Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Gently stir in fava beans.  Remove from heat and let stand for several minutes to allow flavors to meld.
title: Portuguese Favas
